Name: Windows Scheduled Task - Change Path
Description: Changes the execution path of a Windows Scheduled Task for both 2008 and 2012.
Author: atbez

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody: $taskName   = $OctopusParameters['TaskName']$taskFolder = $OctopusParameters['TaskFolder']$taskExe    = $OctopusParameters['TaskExe']$userName   = $OctopusParameters['TaskUserName']$password   = $OctopusParameters['TaskPassword']$taskPath = Join-Path $taskFolder $taskExeWrite-Output "Changing execution path of $taskName to $taskPath"#Check if 2008 Serverif ((Get-WmiObject Win32_OperatingSystem).Name.Contains("2008")){    schtasks /Change /RU $userName /RP $password /TR $taskPath /TN $taskName}else{    Set-ScheduledTask -TaskName $taskName -TaskPath $taskPath -User $userName -Password $password;}

Parameters.Name: TaskName
Parameters.Label: Task Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Windows Scheduled Task.

Parameters.Name: TaskFolder
Parameters.Label: Task Folder
Parameters.HelpText: Folder path of the command to be executed by the Scheduled Task.

Parameters.Name: TaskUserName
Parameters.Label: User Name
Parameters.HelpText: User name the task will run under.

Parameters.Name: TaskPassword
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the user the task will run under.

Parameters.Name: TaskExe
Parameters.Label: Task Executable
Parameters.HelpText: Executable name of the task to be run from the Task Folder.
